remarks: When restricted to complete mappings, the substitution-producing function is bijective to the set of all substitutions.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
mrsubvr.v $e |- V = ( mVR ` T ) $.
mrsubvr.r $e |- R = ( mREx ` T ) $.
mrsubvr.s $e |- S = ( mRSubst ` T ) $.
mrsubff1o $p |- ( T e. W -> ( S |` ( R ^m V ) ) : ( R ^m V ) -1-1-onto-> ran S ) $.
